screen_desc: The screenshot displays the Nova7 launcher settings page. The "Theme" section allows users to choose between Light, Dark, or "Follow system" modes. Below that, there are options to select a Dark theme color, with different shades of black. It also shows a preview of the icon layout, with a setting for adjusting the icon size. The interface is designed to customize the appearance of the home screen.

The user might be referring to signing in to a Nova account if that's a feature offered by the launcher or it could be a misunderstanding, as launchers generally do not have login features. To find out if such an option exists, I need to access the main settings menu or any account-related section in the app.
action_plan: Press the back button to exit the Theme settings and return to the main settings menu.
